slide.title: Oracle Example
slide.example:
<?php
$conn = OCINLogin("user","pass","database")
  or die("unable to connect");
$stmt = OCIParse($coon, "SELECT ... ");
OCIExecute($stmt, OCI_DEFAULT)
  or die ("query failed: ".OCIError($stmt));
while (OCIFetchInto($stmt, $row)) {
  echo " $row[id] ... ";
}
